headline: Dollar Tree, Inc. (DLTR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Dollar Tree, Inc. (DLTR) on Tsoh Investment Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DLTR. Dollar Tree, Inc. (DLTR)’s share was trading at $94.50 as of 6th June. DLTR’s trailing and forward P/E were 18.64 and 17.51 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Dollar Tree faces […]
